    • Constructor Detail

      • ExampleUniqueService

        public ExampleUniqueService()

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()

        Every time NetworkConfig.status is set to NetworkConfig.States.Unbound this method is called synchronously.

        Is called before ParticipantManager is stopped. Therefore the content of ParticipantManager.PARTICIPANTS and ParticipantManager.MY_PID depends on if this application was a network host or client (PARTICIPANTS is maybe empty and MY_PID may contain 0 = not yet identified).

        DON'T EXECUTE LONG RUNNING TASKS HERE, since it blocks the network activity!

      • client

        public void client()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceManager.UniqueService

        Every time NetworkConfig.status is set to NetworkConfig.States.BoundToServer this method is called synchronously.

        The ParticipantManager already has a pid and all other participants currently registered!

        DON'T EXECUTE LONG RUNNING TASKS HERE, since it blocks the network activity!

        Specified by:
        client in interface ServiceManager.UniqueService

      • host

        public void host()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceManager.UniqueService

        Every time NetworkConfig.status is set to NetworkConfig.States.Server this method is called synchronously.

        Is called after ParticipantManager was started. Therefore ParticipantManager.MY_PID is set to 1 and already added to the ParticipantManager.PARTICIPANTS.

        DON'T EXECUTE LONG RUNNING TASKS HERE, since it blocks the network activity!

        Specified by:
        host in interface ServiceManager.UniqueService

      • receive

        public RegisteredMessage receive(RegisteredMessage message)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceManager.UniqueService

        Default behavior is returning null (for all UniqueServices) - message will be forwarded. If at least one UniqueService returns a message object, which will be sent directly, the original message won't be forwarded.

        DON'T EXECUTE LONG RUNNING TASKS HERE, since it blocks the network activity!

        Specified by:
        receive in interface ServiceManager.UniqueService
        Returns:
        If return null there is no interest in this message - no special action will be taken. If it returns a message this message will be sent to the receivers.
